data.comment: Today's referee, Deniz Aytekin, has blown to start the match.
Today's referee, Deniz Aytekin, has blown to start the match.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Florian Kainz for Cologne gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Deniz Aytekin.
Ball goes out of play for a Cologne goal kick.
Marcus Thuram (M´gladbach) strikes at Borussia-Park but his header is cleared.
Cologne pushes forward through Jhon Cordoba, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick M´gladbach.
Deniz Aytekin signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Cologne's half.
Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alassane Plea of M´gladbach smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
Can Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
Throw-in for Cologne in the half of M´gladbach.
Throw-in for Cologne in their own half.
Cologne to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
M´gladbach will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Cologne.
Cologne's Mark Uth misses with an attempt on goal.
Deniz Aytekin awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
Deniz Aytekin awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can M´gladbach capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cologne's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Monchengladbach.
Deniz Aytekin signals a throw-in for Cologne, close to M´gladbach's area.
Throw-in for Cologne at Borussia-Park.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Cologne.
Corner awarded to Cologne.
Florian Kainz of Cologne gets in a strike, but is off target.
M´gladbach have a goal kick.
Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
Throw-in for M´gladbach close to the penalty box.
M´gladbach advance rapidly upfield but Deniz Aytekin blows for offside.
Breel Embolo is on target to give M´gladbach a 1-0 advantage.
Great play from Patrick Herrmann to set up the goal.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Cologne.
Deniz Aytekin signals a free kick to M´gladbach just outside Cologne's area.
Florian Kainz is booked for the away team.
Deniz Aytekin signals a free kick to Cologne in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cologne's half?
Deniz Aytekin signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
Deniz Aytekin signals a Cologne throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Cologne territory.
Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cologne's half?
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Cologne's Ellyes Skhiri goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Deniz Aytekin awards the home team a throw-in.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Deniz Aytekin signals a free kick to Cologne in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Cologne territory.
Important block from the Cologne defence as Alassane Plea fires in a strike for M´gladbach.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
M´gladbach drive upfield and [62] gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a [60] defender.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Deniz Aytekin.
M´gladbach have a dangerous throw-in.
Marcus Thuram (M´gladbach) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Cologne in their own half.
In Monchengladbach M´gladbach drive forward through Patrick Herrmann. His shot is on target but it's saved.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Deniz Aytekin.
[62] ([63]) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Patrick Herrmann (M´gladbach) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Cologne at Borussia-Park.
Deniz Aytekin signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Deniz Aytekin signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Cologne's half.
Corner awarded to Cologne.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Cologne in their own half.
M´gladbach needs to be cautious. Cologne have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Free kick M´gladbach.
Throw-in high up the field for M´gladbach in Monchengladbach.
Cologne are coming forward and Florian Kainz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monchengladbach.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
M´gladbach have a goal kick.
Deniz Aytekin signals a free kick to Cologne in their own half.
Dominick Drexler is on a sub for Florian Kainz for Cologne.
Throw-in for Cologne in the half of M´gladbach.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Cologne at Borussia-Park.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Cologne.
Own goal in Monchengladbach! Jorge Mere scores in his own net to make it 2-0.
Jan Thielmann is replacing Ismail Jakobs for Cologne at Borussia-Park.
Deniz Aytekin signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Rose (M´gladbach) is making a first substitution, with Jonas Hofmann replacing Patrick Herrmann.
Cologne are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Cologne's Mark Uth gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
Throw-in for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Mark Uth strikes to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Borussia-Park.
Ball safe as Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Deniz Aytekin signals a free kick to Cologne in their own half.
The home team have replaced Breel Embolo with Lars Stindl. This is the second substitution made today by Marco Rose.
Free kick for Cologne in the half of M´gladbach.
Cologne surge into the attack at Borussia-Park but Jhon Cordoba’s header is off-target.
Deniz Aytekin awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Mark Uth (Cologne) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Cologne in their own half.
Can Cologne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside M´gladbach's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Markus Gisdol is making the team's third substitution at Borussia-Park with Anthony Modeste replacing Jorge Mere.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Oscar Wendt (M´gladbach) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
M´gladbach push forward at Borussia-Park and Marcus Thuram gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Cologne defence.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Deniz Aytekin.
Marcus Thuram (M´gladbach) gets a yellow card.
Ramy Bensebaini is replacing Marcus Thuram for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
Deniz Aytekin awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
Free kick for Cologne in the half of M´gladbach.
Deniz Aytekin will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monchengladbach.
Deniz Aytekin signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Cologne's half.
Free kick Cologne.
Mark Uth for Cologne drives towards goal at Borussia-Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Dominick Drexler (Cologne) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Cologne have been awarded a corner by Deniz Aytekin.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
